Package com.cmas.database

Class Database

java.lang.Object
com.cmas.database.Database
public class Database extends Object
Database class to maintain persistent data integrity. Reads and writes Hashmap instances to ".txt" files. This class provides methods for loading data from and saving data to serialized files, as well as handling temporary CSV file processing for testing purposes.
Since:
2023-11-14

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Database getInstance()
      Retrieves single instance of database. If it does not exist, database will be initialised via a private constructor
      Returns:
      instance of database

    • loadFromDatabase

      public void loadFromDatabase()
      Loads data from serialized files into the corresponding HashMaps.

    • saveToDatabase

      public void saveToDatabase()
      Saves data from HashMaps to serialized files, ensuring persistent data integrity.
